actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the earnings test.
short_title: Social Security Earnings Test Repeal Act of 2000
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Social Security Earnings Test Repeal Act of 2000 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to repeal the limitation on the amount of outside income which beneficiaries who have attained age 70 may earn (earnings test) without incurring a reduction in benefits.

titles.title: Social Security Earnings Test Repeal Act of 2000
To amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the earnings test.
